Title: Relates to the remediation of lead contaminated soil
Summary: Establishes that areas containing lead-contaminated soil shall have the levels of lead contamination decreased to 300 ppm for residential areas and 1,000 ppm for commercial areas.
LawCode: Amd ยง206, Pub Health L; amd ยง3-0301, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the environmental conservation law, in relation to the remediation of lead contaminated soil
